OnlyLive.label: Only when live
OnlyLive.tooltip: Command is only active when stream is live

command_add.label: Command Name (Add level)
command_add.tooltip: The command the bot will respond to

command_list.label: Command Name (Levels list)
command_list.tooltip: The command the bot will respond to

command_position.label: Command Name (Position on list)
command_position.tooltip: The command the bot will respond to

command_current_level.label: Command Name (Current level)
command_current_level.tooltip: The command the bot will respond to

command_next_level.label: Command Name (Next level)
command_next_level.tooltip: The command the bot will respond to

command_win_level.label: Command Name (Win level)
command_win_level.tooltip: The command the bot will respond to

command_skip_level.label: Command Name (Skip level)
command_skip_level.tooltip: The command the bot will respond to

is_queue_limited.label: Enable queue limit
is_queue_limited.tooltip: Use max levels parameter to limit max levels queued

queue_length.label: Max levels on queue
queue_length.tooltip: Max levels number that can exist in queue

is_user_limited.label: Enable user limit
is_user_limited.tooltip: Use max levels by user parameter to limit user

max_levels_by_user.label: Max levels by user
max_levels_by_user.tooltip: Max levels number that can exist in queue

PermissionBase.label: Permission level (Basic commands)
PermissionBase.tooltip: Set the permission level for add, list, currentlevel, nextlevel, etc.

PermissionInfoBase.label: Permission level info (Basic commands)
PermissionInfoBase.tooltip: Set the user, rank or tier for base permission

PermissionAdvanced.label: Permission level (Adv. commands)
PermissionAdvanced.tooltip: Set the permission level for win or skip commands

PermissionInfoAdvanced.label: Permission level info (Adv. commands)
PermissionInfoAdvanced.tooltip: Set the user, rank or tier for advanced permission

Usage.label: Usage
Usage.tooltip: Usage for where the script can be used!

OnCooldown.value: {0} the command is still on cooldown for {1} seconds!
OnCooldown.label: Cooldown Response
OnCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

OnUserCooldown.value: {0} the command is still on user cooldown for {1} seconds!
OnUserCooldown.label: User Cooldown Response
OnUserCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on user cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

NotEnoughResponse.value: {0} you don't have that many {1} to gamble
NotEnoughResponse.label: Not enough currency response
NotEnoughResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when user try to gamble more than they have 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = Currency name 
 {2} = command name

InfoResponse.value: !add <código> para añadir un nivel a la lista. !currentlevel, !nextlevel o !list para info
InfoResponse.label: Info response
InfoResponse.tooltip: Message sent when user doesn't manage to gamble correctly

PermissionRespBase.value: $user -> Sólo $permissionbase ($permissioninfobase) o superior pueden usar este comando
PermissionRespBase.label: Base Permissions denied response
PermissionRespBase.tooltip:
Message sent when user doesn't select any valid wire. 
{0} = user 
{1} = permission
{2} = permission info

PermissionRespAdvanced.value: $user -> Sólo $permissionadvanced ($permissioninfoadvanced) o superior pueden usar este comando
PermissionRespAdvanced.label: Advanced Permissions denied response
PermissionRespAdvanced.tooltip:
Message sent when user doesn't select any valid wire. 
{0} = user 
{1} = permission
{2} = permission info

ControlC.label: PLACEHOLDER
ControlC.tooltip: Copy the filepath for index.html directly to clipboard for easy insertion in your streaming software

BtnDefaults.label: Restore Default Settings
BtnDefaults.tooltip:
Reset settings back to defaults.
Reload Scripts afterwards to see the changes in the user interface!

openReadMe.label: Open README.txt
openReadMe.tooltip: Opens the README.txt for this script
